summary: Tweaked Lydia Housecarl of Whiterun face, looks younger and [s]weighs a little less[/s]
descriptionHtml:
Lydia didn\'t really need a face change, especially if you had a face texture mod. but lydia mods seem to be quite popular so here is my take on everyone\'s fave housecarl. i only changed appearance, appropriate gender animation and [s]-20 weight (vanilla is 100).[/s]

If you like this, please endorse and check out some of my other NPC face change


------------------
VERSION
[u]Lydia-1_1[/u] fixes neck seam by resetting weight
[u]Lydia-1_1-voice[/u] also neck fixed
[u]Lydia-1[/u] is default file
[u]Lydia-1-withvoice[/u] is default file with voice change from FemaleEventoned to FemaleYoungEager. -requested by Gerogio54

Only download [b][u]one[/u][/b] of these versions, I will update both at the same time
------------------

INSTALL
Drop .bsa and .esp into Data folder
 -Put at bottom of load list
 -Will conflict with mods that also change Lydia\'s face

------------------

Required mods
ApachiiSkyHair 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10168

Recommended mods

You will need these also to replicate my uploaded image:

Coverwomen by MrLenski (any)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3563
Covereyes by MrLenski (any)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4869
DIMONIZED UNP female body
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6709
TWO CASUAL WEARS by Hentai
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12957
Barrel Outfit (Lols galore)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11768

------------------
Creds to above for their awesome textures and meshes
author: YellowPaint
